full_summary:
### Generator Switchboard Replacement Project
#### Project Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to design, remove, and replace the backup power switchboard and automatic transfer switch, as well as install a new panelboard to serve the existing fire pumps at the Joseph A. Ghiz Building in Summerside, PEI. The project aims to ensure a reliable backup power supply for essential systems at the site.

#### Project Details
* Project Start Date: September 15, 2023
* Contract Period: Estimated completion date by June 30, 2024
* Estimated Budget: $100,001 to $500,000
* Location: Joseph A. Ghiz Building, Summerside, PEI
* Services Required:
	+ Design and removal of the existing backup power switchboard and automatic transfer switch
	+ Installation of a new panelboard to serve the existing fire pumps
	+ Procurement and installation of a new backup power switchboard and automatic transfer switch
	+ Commissioning and testing of the new system
* Request Method:
	+ This is an open tender with a sole-source procurement.
	+ Bids must be submitted electronically through SAP Ariba by the closing date (September 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM) Conditions

	Chief Contracting Officer:
	Miller, Rachel (SPAC/PSPC)
	Email: rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	Site Visit:
	An optional site visit is scheduled. Interested contractors must contact the Contracting Authority for details.

#### Proposal Submission Guidelines

* Bidders must submit their proposals only via SAP Ariba.
* The RFP issuing office is Atlantic Region Acquisitions, Halifax, N.S. B3J 1T3.
* Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Debriefing:
	+ Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.
	+ Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from the date the bid was unsuccessful.

#### Technical Description
According to the UNECE classification, the required services fall under the following categories:
* 72121400: Specialized public building construction services
* 72151500: Electrical system services
* 72151505: Standby or emergency power installation service
* 72151514: Standby or emergency power maintenance service

#### Contracting Authority Information

* Contracting
